name: PRINT BOX
description: Use this command to display a box on the screen.
syntax: PBOX type AT up_lt_col,up_lt_row LEN length WDT width CLR COLOR color ABS

parameters.name: type
parameters.description: Optional - The box type options. S - single line, D - double line and C - custom. The default is S.

parameters.name: up_lt_col
parameters.description: The upper left column value. Together with the upper left row value defines the upper left corner of the box. The upper left corner of any window is 1,1.

parameters.name: up_lt_row
parameters.description: The upper left row value. Together with the upper left column value defines the upper left corner of the box. The upper left corner of any window is 1,1.

parameters.name: LEN
parameters.description: Optional - The vertical depth of the box. For example, if the starting row value is 5 and you want the lower horizontal portion of the box to be on row 10 then the length is 6. If no value is given the default is 0. In this case the program will print a single horizontal line.

parameters.name: length
parameters.description: The vertical depth of the box. For example, if the starting row value is 5 and you want the lower horizontal portion of the box to be on row 10 then the length is 6. If no value is given the default is 0. In this case the program will print a single horizontal line.

parameters.name: WDT
parameters.description: Optional - The horizontal width of the box. For example, if the starting column value is 5 and you want the far right corner of the box to be on column 10 then the width is 6. If no value is given the default is 0. In this case the program will print a single vertical line.

parameters.name: width
parameters.description: The horizontal width of the box. For example, if the starting column value is 5 and you want the far right corner of the box to be on column 10 then the width is 6. If no value is given the default is 0. In this case the program will print a single vertical line.

parameters.name: CLR
parameters.description: Optional - You can use this option if you want to clear a box that currently exists.
